text: Ani jevha musa apalya janasamuhacya lokanna mhanale, ki allahacya tya krpa denagyanci athavana kara jya tyane tumhala dilya aheta, jevha tyane tumhala phira'aunacya sathidarampasuna sodavile je tumhala phara duhkha pohacavita hote. Tumacya putranci hatya karita ani tumacya mulinna jivanta soduna deta. Yata tumacya palanakartyatarphe tumaci phara mothi kasoti hoti
